DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effect non-surgical integrative package consist Chuna herbal medicine , Chuna manual therapy , bee-venom pharmacoacupuncture , acupuncture fail back surgery syndrome mean prospective case series .
DOC.brief_title: The Effectiveness Non-surgical Integrative Package Failed Back Surgery Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study investigate effect non-surgical integrative package fail back surgery syndrome mean prospective case series . After initial screening , treatment administer one session week 16 week . Patients follow 4 8 week conclusion treatment . The integrative package use study consist 120ml Chuna herbal medicine ( Ostericum koreanum , Eucommia ulmoides , Acanthopanax Sessiliflorus , Achyranthes bidentata , Psoralea corylifolia , Peucedanum japonicum , Cibotium barometz , Lycium chinense , Boschniakia rossica , Cuscuta chinensis ) dry extract pill form ( Cibotium barometz , Atractylodes japonica ) take twice day 30 minute meal , Chuna manual therapy , intermuscular injection bee-venom pharmacoacupuncture ( Select 6 acupoints , concentration 10,000:1 , 0.1 cc per acupoint , total amount inject 1.0 cc/session ) , acupuncture allow NSAID intake investigational period . The subject allow maximum 3 pills/day , take minimum 8 hrs apart . The number pill take measure 4 wks conclusion treatment .
DOC.criteria: Patients suffer low back pain and/or leg pain improve return symptom within 1 year spinal surgery Low back pain and/or leg pain duration least 3 week baseline Low back pain and/or leg pain least 60mm VAS scale Age 18 60 Given consent lumbar MRI Voluntary participation write consent give study consent form Given consent receive treatment concern pain due spinal disorder study participation period Diagnosis serious disease ( ) possible cause back pain malignancy , vertebral fracture , spinal infection , inflammatory spondylitis , cauda equina compression , etc . Prior diagnosis chronic disease ( ) could affect effectiveness interpretation treatment result cardiovascular disease , diabetic neuropathy , fibromyalgia , rheumatoid arthritis , Alzheimer 's disease , epilepsy , etc . Progressive neurologic deficit ( ) concurrent severe neurological symptom Unsuitable risk complication acupuncture treatment patient clot disorder , severe diabetes risk infection , serious cardiovascular disease , undergo anticoagulant treatment , etc . Under prescription corticosteroid , immunosuppressant drug , psychiatric medicine , medication consider unsuitable subject researcher Experience gastroenteric complication take NSAIDs currently undergo treatment digestive disorder During pregnancy suspect pregnancy Subjects consider unsuitable clinical trial researcher
